DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate potential drug-drug interaction PF-04937319 ketoconazole , potent inhibitor drug metabolize enzyme CYP3A .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Estimate The Effect Of Ketoconazole On The Pharmacokinetics Of Pf-04937319 In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 29.9 kg/m2 ; total body weight > =50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Subjects childbearing potential must agree use highly effective method contraception throughout study least 28days last dose treatment . Use prescription nonprescription drug dietary supplement within 7 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior first dose study medication . Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method nonhormonal contraception Consumption grapefruitcontaining product within 7 day prior first dose study medication study protocol least 14 day prior first dose study medication least 28 day last dose study medication
